description: Try our easy to follow Easy gozleme recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy gozleme Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g no added salt diced tomatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a chargrill pan over medium heat. Cook gozlemes for 23 minutes on each side, brushing with a little of the remaining oil, or until golden and heated through. Serve with lemon.
